website_summaries.verdict: With an outdated design and a lack of unique features, AccuWeather just can't stand up to other Android weather apps.
pros: Widgets show weather info for multiple locations

customer_reviews.title: Excellent app
customer_reviews.text: Gives good information. Using it in Turkey at the moment. Knowing direction of wind helps in choosing which way to go hiking, where will be more sheltered
customer_reviews.author: Crackerjack46

customer_reviews.title: Best weather forecasts so far
customer_reviews.text: No weather forecast is perfect, especially not the BBC Weather, but Accuweather is the best so far. It can be a little enthusiastic with the temperature (take 2 degrees off, then you are close to the real temperature), but rain and wind predictions are usually spot on. Must have...
customer_reviews.author: W. Webster

customer_reviews.title: A very, very accurate weather app. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this app for quite a number of years now on various tablets. It has always been accurate, however it is improved on year by year. I have just downloaded the latest version onto my new android tablet. It is even better than the previous versions. The Radar is particularly usefull with great graphics. It is now almost instantaneous. A free app, therefore, give it a try, far easier than the apps for other well known weather predictors.
customer_reviews.author: COPPIS

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate weather. Like the minute by minute 'current conditiy' feature
customer_reviews.author: Esme Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to use, and acurate.
customer_reviews.text: I've not tried this type of app before. I'm very pleased with this, as it's fairly straight forward to use, and gives the information required. My only slight niggle with this app, is, the text is a bit small, and I have to use a powerful magnification aid to read it. Other than this, I think it's a good app to have. I'm glad I downloaded it! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Accurate for short term detail
customer_reviews.text: Really good for predicting the day ahead. Minutecast is a great tool for seeing if it'll rain in the next couple of hours, and the satellite history helps you to see rain making it's way towards you! Other apps may be better for longer term accuracy but I use this one the most for checking up to 48hrs ahead
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ben Wain

customer_reviews.title: Works well, I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very sophisticated and professional but easy to use and read, helps me choose when I have to go to work (Usually work is closed when the weather is bad). There is a notification bar which tells me what the current weather/temperature is and even gives me a diagram representing the weather currently (Cloud, sun/cloud, sun., moon). Good app for anyone who needs to know the weather...
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Simons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent free weather app with adverts
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and it actually works well. As for the negatives, I dislike the personalisation options, surely no-one is going to sit down and define their preferred weather criteria for various activities - pointless bloatware. Nor do I wish to start watching news and weather broadcasts. In my opinion this app should do one thing and do it really well. I think all the above takes away from the apps ability to deliver concise weather information. I find myself scrolling left and right, when really all the information could be fitted into one screen. But it is much more functional than some other weather apps.
customer_reviews.author: C Roberts & Family

customer_reviews.title: Great accuracy with predictions
customer_reviews.text: This app gives the best accuracy I have found in any weather forecast and your day out (weather wise) can be undertaken with confidence + users have the ability to assist with predictions when called upon
customer_reviews.author: Tommy S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Clear information, easy to understand but when you delve deeper it contains lots detail, it is worth spending some time discovering all the different features of this very comprehensive application
customer_reviews.author: Tl

customer_reviews.title: Forecasts for all the family
customer_reviews.text: Much better than many others I have tried , and I've tried a lot ! ! Straightforward and easy to use . Give it a try , you will be very pleasantly surprised. All the forecasts you need at your finger tips.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this app
customer_reviews.text: I love this app. I find it more reliable and accurate than the other weather apps. The layout makes it easy to see all the information you need and the graphics aren't over the top like some apps on the market. Overall a nice simple design which is easy on the eye, easy to use and easy to set up. If I had to criticise the app I would say it would be nice for the maps and video page to feature the Uk for their British users - a minor point ( but it it would be the icing on what is a delicious cake).
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Nicely polished app
customer_reviews.text: Works fine on a Samsung Galaxy S5 A nicely polished app, with plenty of weather info such as UV index, humidity, visibility, dew point, pressure, wind speed and temperature. Weather reports can be for your location or you can add locations to monitor. You also get maps, videos and weather news. You get an hourly breakdown of weather and a look ahead. Weather predictions have so far been fairly accurate for me.
customer_reviews.author: TB_family

customer_reviews.title: Too much to see!
customer_reviews.text: I rate the AccuWeather website so I downloaded this app. It is useful in that you can select and save weather reports for various locations - for example see the weather in your holiday resort while at the same time seeing what the weather is like at home. However the (big) downside so far as I was concerned was the incredibly cluttered screen, which made using it a real eye and brain strain! BBC weather is infinitely preferable at least for clarity and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Boy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect forecasts easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: What can one say, put your location in and outcome of forecast is displayed daily or hourly. Whatever you choose the weather prediction is good
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: best about I think
customer_reviews.text: Problaly the most accurate app that's free about we where at the wickerman festival and it said there would be light showers at 11.34pm so as you do when at a festival wait and stare at the stars and suddenly there where showers checked and it was at exact time and how long they where going to be for and all the other options wind speed precip so accurate and for free
customer_reviews.author: Granddaddy purple

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Like most weather apps its easy to use however like most other weather apps out there its not particularly great at "forecasting" ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Olive Oyl

customer_reviews.title: Want to know when it will stop raining?
customer_reviews.text: Came across this app whilst on holiday in North Carolina. Proved to be very reliable, it doesn't have the Radar that comes with being located in USA, though. Gives a rain map of your area (and other locations, which you can select) which is worth its weight in Gold. I have it installed on my Kindle eReader and my Android phone. There is more info on the Kindle version (due to bigger screen). Well worth having.
customer_reviews.author: Andy. Lancashire Lad

customer_reviews.title: Best weather  app you can have
customer_reviews.text: A great app because it also gives you the feel factor. As well as temperature an isn't that far out when it going to rain
customer_reviews.author: Davidkayelesse

customer_reviews.title: One of the best weather apps.
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this app as it allows you to add several locations, which means if you are planning a trip, you can check the weather at your destination, as well as at home. It also gives a percentage likelihood of rain, instead of just saying how much rain there has been, and you can get hourly forecasts. For me, this is brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Amal

customer_reviews.title: Accuweather
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful weather app easy to use gives you lots of information for the weather no matter where you are
customer_reviews.author: Beverley Parker

customer_reviews.title: reliable indication
customer_reviews.text: Any weather prediction is always going to miss the msrk. However, I find this app to be pretty reliable - especially on the short to mid range forecasts. Probably the best of the similar apps on offer.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Ok but found bbc just as good
customer_reviews.text: Fairly close with weather predictions but when using GPS kept giving wrong address very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Always seems to be bang on with the forecasts and a must for anybody travelling home or abroad,,😎
customer_reviews.author: Colin Wright

customer_reviews.title: Excellent app & free!
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb weather app and it's just amazing that it is free. Downloaded to the Kindle fire in less than a minute and found my location in France almost immediately. Lots of features. The only slightly annoying feature is the American accents of the weather girls. And the country forecast is for the USA only. Shame it isn't for your country of location and with a British English speaker. A small niggle though and I still give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Accuweather app
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be the most accurate weather all you can get. So far it has pretty well spot on.
customer_reviews.author: karen webb

customer_reviews.title: I like the page layout of AccuWeather and have added additional ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using AccuWeather because I am tired of other weather providers (BBC and Met Office) being continually inaccurate and over complicated. I like the page layout of AccuWeather and have added additional locations to my page to check the holiday time weather at those locations. Thank you AccuWeather.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelH

customer_reviews.title: Much needed if you live in England!
customer_reviews.text: With the vagaries of English weather AccuWeather is a real friend. It is easy to use. Set up your own preferences such as imperial or metric. The hour by hour detail is useful when you work across sites or want to plan tasks such as gardening or drying the clothes. I also like that you can set for more than one destination and can picture family and friends wherever they are in the world. I have it on both my smart phone and kindle.
customer_reviews.author: WallE

customer_reviews.title: but I'm not at home!
customer_reviews.text: I have an AccuWeather app pre installed on my phone. Thankfully when I downloaded this it didn't replace the old one. Even though the app is set to tell the weather at my current location it tells me the weather at home (only 300 miles away just now!!) The temperature displayed in the menu bar thing at the top is for my current location as the the report on the drop down menu but the front screen says I'm still at home! I've gone back to the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Tortoise

customer_reviews.title: Wildly innaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Has predicted rain several times, on a day where it has been dry. Keeps getting it wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent weather app
customer_reviews.text: I became familiar with using accuweather on my laptop and this is a good app. I like looking at the hourly predictions which are usually accurate as it helps when planning dog walks! The location may seem specific but I suspect is fairly general..compare various locations around you for best accuracy.I Like the efficient ability to see the weather in any world location (useful for holidays). No weather forecast will be completely right ,especially a few days ahead...the met office get it wrong, so what can you do?but this is my weather forecaster of choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great App
customer_reviews.text: This is a very accurate weather app. Good features including the option to add weather from other locations which is useful just before going on holiday. The 7 days advance weather is also worthy of a mention too. If you want a clean straightforward weather app I would highly recommend Accu Weather.
customer_reviews.author: Karene

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my area, 96% accurate so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my area, 96% accurate so far, but will check it out over the next few weeks to see how accurate it is in a longer time period.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and accur
customer_reviews.text: Very good app that is accurate at a very local level. Also useful for planning dog walks!
customer_reviews.author: LouiseS

customer_reviews.title: Too static, rather pointless.
customer_reviews.text: Good idea, bad implementation. It is far too limited in options, too static in display and doesn't offer sufficient or swift viewing. Just look up the weather forecast online. Pretty pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Strong Coffee Please

customer_reviews.title: Keep it simple
customer_reviews.text: Keep it simple It does what it says it's gonna do an does it well. It's simple to use, it's simple to set up, You can set it up if you wish so it can tell you to grab a coat or a umbrella, It keeps you clued up at a glance. an it's as simple or as in depth as you want it to be. An it's FREE !!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Need an accurate easy to understand weather app and this fits the job well
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: World weather. You can see at a glance what's happening else where
customer_reviews.text: W very good product informative and interesting. I like the radar it gives you a picture of what is likely to happen.y
customer_reviews.author: Jane W.

customer_reviews.title: Good to check before travelling
customer_reviews.text: Got this as the met office one on my moby gave up the ghost with no updates. I found this one to be surprisingly really good and accurate in the information it gave. All you do is type in a location and it gives you the weather immediately.
customer_reviews.author: lightning720

customer_reviews.title: An excellent weather app
customer_reviews.text: The layout is good with plenty of detail. It is very accurate with both current weather and forecasts.
customer_reviews.author: Annelie

customer_reviews.title: Cool App
customer_reviews.text: Cool app, I use it on firestick for upcoming weather. Works well, plenty of info and doesn't crash.
customer_reviews.author: I. M. Knight

customer_reviews.title: 5🌟
customer_reviews.text: Accuweather is a great app that affords forward planning re expeditions, journeys. This has been very beneficial now that the UK us experiencing inclement weather by way of snow etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bernise_J

customer_reviews.title: Default wrong; can't change
customer_reviews.text: Use to be excellent; now it defaults to wrong location which cannot be changed.
customer_reviews.author: geni

customer_reviews.title: My Virw , Accu Weather
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok. It is clear, and has many facts - such as wind speed, and direction etc. It has choice of daily or hourly readings, which I like; it gets a text when 'rain' if forecast at a certain time, and it actually happens; I am impressed. Definitely worth installing.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: AccuWeather App
customer_reviews.text: My favourite weather app for over 5 years and it just keeps improving. Highly recommended for multiple places.
customer_reviews.author: George P. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Good app
customer_reviews.text: This is the only weather app I use, I find it very accurate, it rarely lets me down.
customer_reviews.author: Shep

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: Had this app for years. Seems one of the best out there
customer_reviews.author: R W BENNETT

customer_reviews.title: Mostly accurate forecast
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all. Easy to understand well presented
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: One of the best and most informative weather apps available. Much better than weather reports on the radio and television.
customer_reviews.author: Debs

customer_reviews.title: awful App
customer_reviews.text: Absolute rubbish it's just trying to scam your phone to get the app to target adverts. Had an older version of it which was fine. I don't want adverts based on photos in my PC I want the weather only
customer_reviews.author: V R D Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Really Useful App
customer_reviews.text: This app is installed on both my phone & Kindle fire. I find it very accurate for both home & other destinations.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: This app does exactly what it says - accurate. Easy to read every day.
customer_reviews.author: Cinder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent App
customer_reviews.text: This is very accurate and gets the weather right time and time again. Bizzarly I have found it is sometimes an hour out, if it says it will rain at 1500 it rains at 1600, that could of course be nothing to do with the App just the fickle British weather we love to complain about. Well worth installing
customer_reviews.author: Rookesy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the contents
customer_reviews.text: I uninstalled as it's no good on the Fire stick. It's trying to be YouTube with videos to watch??? Take them off. I just want to know if it's going to rain.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Great App.
customer_reviews.text: Love the detail and information I get from this app. It's brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It is free! It works! It loads fast, finds my location automatically in a few seconds! Ability to check weather hourly! And with many extra features it is just perfect app! Did not have any problems so far, contrary to many other weather apps which I have tried for my Kindle Fire!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate forecasting
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant app. One of the best apps for accurate weather forecast. Tried others but found them unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: mr sf bottreill

customer_reviews.title: Accurate weather.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little app, I tells you...to the minute when it will rain in your area. Very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Johnson

customer_reviews.title: most accurate weather forecast
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this app five stars on two grounds: 1. Having tried other weather forecasts such as BBC weather I find this the most accurate. 2. It is a well designed app that has a number of useful features. I like that you can see whether there is any rain coming, Minutecast and hourly forecasts.
customer_reviews.author: S. King

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Lots of information here, but I find this app very messy to use. Cluttered graphics - maps are too small to be useful. I think it tries to do too much.
customer_reviews.author: John Bennett

customer_reviews.title: A great app
customer_reviews.text: This is a very accurate weather app. Recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The most reliable weather app out there
customer_reviews.text: I had this app free on both of my previous android phones - came pre-loaded - and I've always found it to be reliable. So when I got a new Kindle for Christmas, adding this app was a no-no-brainer. I love the fact that Accuweather can find your current location (even if it is a tiny hamlet in Burgundy), as well as give you accurate forecasts in other locations. My son is in a small town in Arkansas for a few weeks and I can look up the weather there too. I am delighted with this latest update with the addition of maps. This is a great app and I recommend it fully.
customer_reviews.author: YinxFed

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and clear
customer_reviews.text: Best on the market to find local weather conditions in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: JTK

customer_reviews.title: Weather as it should be!
customer_reviews.text: Clear, easy to understand layout not only for today's weather but also of the coming days. Understandable at a glance, just what I needed, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rain or Shine?
customer_reviews.text: Nice to know what the weather will bring on planning days out.
customer_reviews.author: Honey bun

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Best weather app I have seen with the most accurate weather for multiple and diverse locations. This totally saved my bacon when I drove from ON to MD a few weeks ago and was able to plot out my trip avoiding near blizzard conditions. (Nearly) Now that I am back in the UK, it is my daily companion and I have an accurate view of the weather where my kids are too. Awesome app!
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent app
customer_reviews.text: Excellent app I have this on my phone as well as my tablet. Watching the weather in my job is important. Accurate always spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: More accurate for me than the BBC...
customer_reviews.text: The only weather app for me - it has everything; maps, daily and hourly forcasts, simple and entertaining interface.... If the weather was less chaotic it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: everyday!
customer_reviews.text: varares in one application to another. Some easier to use
customer_reviews.author: lekker

customer_reviews.title: Precise
customer_reviews.text: It's very accurate & precise. Hour by hour weather movements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for weather watchers
customer_reviews.text: I like to keep my eye on the weather so have this app on all my mobile devices! You can set it up to look at lots of locations and get long range forecasts which is useful if you are planning a holiday and want to know what clothes to take for example. Also let's you look at pollen count and if you are planning to do sports lets you know the outlook.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I do like the AccuWeather app. This app does not seem as fully featured as the versions on other platforms.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Won’t work can’t sign in and when you do it won’t let you in
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: AccuWeather is actually an accurate weather forecast, beats the other weather efforts. If it says "it will rain in 76 minutes" it usually does or is close, very good.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Like the minute cast for reasonably good weather updates on when it will rain within 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: A Fogg

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to download the met office weather app onto my kindle fire but couldn't find it among available but now I'm happy that I couldn't! This app is great and fun to play with in a nerdy kind of way :) I like that you can pre-set different areas and easily flick between them, I also really like all the extra info available - all round great app!
customer_reviews.author: twilight heaven

customer_reviews.title: Straightforward and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I'very tried many online weather programmes and always seem to come back to accuweather, because it's an accurate, well presented programme. I like the options it provides as well as the interface. I don't think I can get a better example!
customer_reviews.author: MDW

customer_reviews.title: Weather Reports
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my Kindle, easy to set up , clear readings and up to now has been pretty accurate. A good guide to weather conditions
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still the best, (when it works) ;)
customer_reviews.text: Still my fave weather app. clear, accurate and easy to use... Only one miner prob, every now and then it seems to stop running for seemingly no reason, however a simple uninstall and re-install seems to sort it right out. If your using a relatively low res screen then its probably best if you turn off the graphs, done via the top right menu.
customer_reviews.author: John Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Downloaded this onto an Android phone - it comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded this onto an Android phone - it comes with ads, which I detest and won't tolerate. Perhaps they get a fee from Google, as I then downloaded the BBC weather app which does not have ads.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jan R. Zabkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Hard to believe it's free.
customer_reviews.text: Better than both of the paid weather apps I've tried. Can't believe any other could tell you more than this one does. It sometimes takes a little while to get up and running at first, but this is not said to criticise because it's gathering information. It's better, in my opinion, the professional TV forecast. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Long

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good app. Use it a lot, not sure the weather info is always accurate, but does anyone ever get the weather forecast right? It is easy to use and great that I can get other locations. Very useful. Would recommend for anyone who wants to check the weather a few days in advance or temperatures - which are usually accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Clear
customer_reviews.text: Quite easy to use, clear presentation of weather conditions. I can't speak for the accuracy of any weather forecast app. I use two weather apps and mentally average the results.
customer_reviews.author: Paul.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: As always Five Stars. Even better now I have Fire Stick.
customer_reviews.author: D Hurt

customer_reviews.title: A great help!
customer_reviews.text: As I move around all the time, it keeps me up to date very simply with the weather wherever I'm going to, or coming from, even way across the pond in Missouri. I never need to wonder what to pack any more! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Saunders

customer_reviews.title: great app
customer_reviews.text: Interesting detail given, hourly, 36 hours, 10 days, and its aptly named title is extremely "accurate". I found my home town easily and have other places of interest listed also. I would definitely recommend this app over other weather apps I have tried and tested and have already recommended it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: mrs d

customer_reviews.title: useful adjunct to Met Office forecasts
customer_reviews.text: This app is a really accessible bit of kit for those who do a lot of outdoor activities! I use it throughout the year for both Sea Scouting and for Duke of Edinburgh expedition weekends as it is quick and accurate helping to know what to plan for weather wise. The hour by hour breakdown is particularly helpful!
customer_reviews.author: TeacherAdam

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate simple to follow weather app. Will keep using this app to keep updated on weather conditions. Handy for making plans for day out
customer_reviews.author: kaz

customer_reviews.title: Useful for job
customer_reviews.text: Great for everyday forcast fast quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: jim morris

customer_reviews.title: Very good app for the weather
customer_reviews.text: Good interface and simple to use screens. Shoes the desired data in one place, rather than multiple menus. Seems reasonably accurate, but can hearing as is expected, as all weather apps seem to show different weather at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Owen J-W

customer_reviews.title: Great useful app
customer_reviews.text: I use this app all the time. Love it. Usually always right.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, fairly accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Nice layout, fairly accurate but tricky to pick my home town, Newport, as won't go down to county level. Have I picked Newport for Wales or Isle of Wight?
customer_reviews.author: isle of wight buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great weather app
customer_reviews.text: Very good and accurate weather forecasts, easy to use and navigate
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Accuweather is an american service that tries but fails to provide accurate global services, this being a typical example
customer_reviews.author: RikiM

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Have got AccuWeather on my android phone and my Kindle Fire and they are not the same. The phone version seems much more intuitive and therefore easier to navigate. It also allows me to put in my own town whereas on Kindle it's just the nearest city. So the Kindle version - reviewed here- is a bit clunky but it still ultimately gives the necessary info.
customer_reviews.author: Slowfooder

customer_reviews.title: Top weather forecasts
customer_reviews.text: I always find this app to be as near as dam it correct for my area
customer_reviews.author: yvonne chester

customer_reviews.title: an excellent upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first app I put on my Kindle ages ago and during the last couple of days it upgraded itself. The new version is great and the ease of use is incredible plus playing with the maps has brought back many fond holiday memories. I'll probably buy the full version.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Decent app .
customer_reviews.text: Great app works well. And forecasting is as accurate as it can be.
customer_reviews.author: sa suter

customer_reviews.title: NEVER RAINS
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how some people don't understand the meaning of "local showers" you can be on the other side of the street and get wet or sit in sunshine. Ah well it never rains.........
customer_reviews.author: BOBBY66

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Intresting and informative Thanks PS also accurate as the name suggests
customer_reviews.author: FRPooley
